name: Lost Recipes
summary:
Embrace your inner chef!

Learn and master different recipes across three historically authentic kitchens. Lost Recipes is a satisfying and realistic cooking experience, without the hurry or the clean-up!

Highlights

♦ Cook in traditional kitchens across ancient Greek, Chinese, and Maya civilizations 

{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}
